changeSet.comment: Add column account_id to account_accesses table
changeSet.sql: update account_accesses set account_id = (select id from deposit_account where deposit_account.iban = account_accesses.iban LIMIT 1)

changeSet.author: oza@adorsys.com.ua
changeSet.comment: Add column account_id to payment table
changeSet.sql: update payment set account_id = (select id from deposit_account where deposit_account.iban = payment.debt_iban LIMIT 1)
